text: Dove Cameron ’ s secret role in Marvel ’ s Agents of S. H. I. E. L. D. … is no longer such a secret. Cameron will play Ruby, a brainy young woman who has “ a mysterious obsession ” with Daisy Johnson, according to Entertainment Weekly. Ruby is also the daughter of General Hale, the stone - cold military type who kept Fitz prisoner for months after his teammates ’ diner abduction.
